result.eng: We expected three but only one person came.
result.ga: bhí muid ag súil le triúr agus níor tháinig ach duine
result.orig: Bhí muid ag súil le triúr agus níor tháinig ach duine

result.ga: bhí triúr iníonacha ag an rí

result.eng: I am sharing a house with three others.

result.orig: Tá mé ag roinnt tí le triúr eile
result.html: tá mé ag roinnt tí le triúr eileI am sharing a house with three others.

result.eng: Three are in America, two in Australia, another two in England and one in South Africa.

result.eng: She is married with three children.

result.eng: There are three of you in the house, then.

result.eng: Two people were killed and three others were injured.

result.eng: There were only three people on board the airplane.

result.eng: Three women were wading through the snow.
